question: 迷惑メール
sourceMnemonic: When you have <vocabulary>troublesome</vocabulary> (<ja>迷惑</ja>) mail, you have mail you don't want. This is known as <vocabulary>spam</vocabulary>, <vocabulary>spam mail</vocabulary>, or <vocabulary>junk mail</vocabulary>. On a more technical level it's <vocabulary>unsolicited mail</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The reading comes from <ja>迷惑</ja>, so if you know that you know this (and then this vocab word won't be unsolicited as well!)
